channel.title: Ari-Scape A 718 RSPS
channel.description:
[CENTER]CLIENT DOWNLOAD: [url=http://tinyurl.com/ovje57w]http://tinyurl.com/ovje57w[/url] Webclient: [URL=http://ariscape.net76.net/webclient.html]http://ariscape.net76.net/webclient.html[/URL] Forums: [url=http://ariscape.net76.net/]http://ariscape.net76.net/[/url] Hello everyone Welcome to Ari-Scape. Ari-scape is a 718 RSPS. We are also always looking for worthy and dedicated staff members.
Heres some features that we have to offer you:
[SIZE=5]BOSSES:[/SIZE] Custom Boss Blink Custom Boss YK'Lagor The Thunderous Nex Bandos Armadyl Zamorak Saradomin Tormented Demons Corporal Beast King Black Dragon Queen Black Dragon Hati Wildywyrms Glacors Avatar Of Destruction Nomad boss fight
[SIZE=5]MINIGAMES[/SIZE] Troll Invasion! Barrows Clan Wars Duel Arena Castle Wars Fight Caves Fight Pits Fight Kiln Crucible Brimhaven Agility Trivia Zombies
[SIZE=5]SKILLING[/SIZE] Catheryby: Fishing and cooking Al-Kharid Mining Lava-Flow Mining Gnome Agility Course Summoning In Taverley Artisan's Workshop Runecrafting: Air obelisks Hunter puro puro Dominion Tower Slayer
[SIZE=5]PVP Areas[/SIZE] Mage Bank Revenants EdgeVille
MEDIA:
[IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70379108/blink.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://i.share.pho.to/a490c778_l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.share.pho.to/41a109c3_l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.share.pho.to/a50e3bb1_l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.share.pho.to/c3390853_l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.share.pho.to/6e8cdc52_l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.share.pho.to/35c23ca2_l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.share.pho.to/9cdbd2a3_l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.share.pho.to/9279653c_l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.share.pho.to/59fe5c54_l.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70379108/corp.PNG[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70379108/BANDOS.PNG[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70379108/pk.PNG[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70379108/nex.PNG[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70379108/emotes.PNG[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70379108/join.PNG[/img]
Thanks For taking the time to read all of this, i'm working very hard on this server adding things fixing things and making it better for everyone:) We hope too see you online soon! Thanks ~Aristant PLEASE NO SPAM:)[/CENTER]
